attributes.additional_details: It seems ridiculous to ask this, but don't take away the jury from the courts. For the sake of transparency and ancient rights to all citizens for a fair and impartial trial
attributes.background: This is a fundamental judicial need in this country, established 800 years ago. We need to keep it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
